argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummatr01.p | |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) |
| 2 |  | gsummatr01.r | |- R = { r e. P | ( r ` K ) = L } |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( r = Q -> ( r ` K ) = ( Q ` K ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( r = Q -> ( ( r ` K ) = L <-> ( Q ` K ) = L ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( Q e. R <-> ( Q e. P /\ ( Q ` K ) = L ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simplbi | |- ( Q e. R -> Q e. P ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( SymGrp ` N ) = ( SymGrp ` N ) |
| 8 | 7, 1 | #P_symgfv | |- ( ( Q e. P /\ X e. N ) -> ( Q ` X ) e. N ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( Q e. R /\ X e. N ) -> ( Q ` X ) e. N ) |
